StandardInvocableActionType.name: StandardInvocableActionType
StandardInvocableActionType.description: Represents a collection of fields to set up granular user permissions for access to a standard invocable action in Flow Builder.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name and namespace combination of the invocable action. This combination must be unique.

Language.description: The language code of the invocable action. For a full list of supported languages and their codes, see Supported Languages. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later.

MasterLabel.description: The label for the invocable action. This display value is the internal label that doesn’t get translated. This field is available in API version 60.0 and later.

Namespace.description: The namespace of the invocable action. Enter a value only if you’re using the invocable action in Flow Builder or with Apex.
